DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Safety Study High Dose Donepezil Parkinson 's Disease With Dementia
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , prospective , randomize parallel study . The investigator evaluate efficacy high-dose donepezil patient Parkinson 's disease dementia ( PDD ) take standard donepezil ( 10mg ) 12 week . The participant , sign informed consent , assign two group randomly ( high-dose donepezil group standard donepezil group ) . All participant maintain medication 24 week assess cognitive function 24 week . They visit clinic 3 time ( 4 , 12 , 24 week ) assess cognitive function adverse event . After end study , participant administrate standard dose donepezil .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients diagnose Parkinson 's disease accord Queen Brain Bank criterion Patients diagnose dementia diagnose Parkinson 's disease least 1 year .
